Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2016 08:33PM mountain-gal wrote: Thank you, Stefajoy, for posting such a powerful reminder that when we are alive, we are to be alive. I take such inspiration from cancer, it has taught me so much. (I wish it would have gone away, but none of us are promised that) I echo your sentiments - David Bowie gave us a guide to living.
Posts.Title: Inspiration from David Bowie ABeautifulSunset Longtermsurvivor
